sourcesContent:
<section>
  <form (ngSubmit)="filterResults(filterInput.value)">  <!-- configurado para manejar la búsqueda. Se invoca cuando se envía el formulario -->
    <input type="text" placeholder="Filter by city" #filterInput>
    <button class="primary" type="submit" (click)="logClick()">Search</button>
  </form>
</section>
<section class="results">
  <app-housing-location *ngFor="let housingLocation of filteredLocationList" 
    [housingLocation]="housingLocation"></app-housing-location>
</section>
